DOC.brief_summary: Computer-aided image recognition will improve the technique of endoscopic ultrasound-celiac plexus block/celiac plexus neurolysis (EUS-CPB/CPN) and improved pain relief.
DOC.detailed_description: All subjects who are undergoing EUS will be eligible. Consecutive patients undergoing EUS will be invited to participate in this study. Subjects must be 18 years old or above at the time of the procedure.
